element_text:
{"chunk": "Distributable reserves in group enterprises which are
distributed as dividends to the parent at the balance
sheet date are included in the value of investments.
Group enterprises with negative net asset values are
measured at zero, and any receivable from such
enterprises is written down by the Parent's share of the
negative net asset value to the extend deemed
irrecoverable. If the negative net asset value exceeds the
amount receivable, the remaining amount is recognised
in provisions to the extent the Parent has a legal or", "context": "The chunk describes the accounting treatment for investments in group enterprises, including how the carrying amount of such investments is determined and how receivables from group enterprises with negative net asset values are handled."}
